message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand its worth to you is $15000. To facilitate this transaction and ensure it aligns with both our interests, I propose an offer of $13500 for the product. This price not only allows us to maintain a fair exchange but also provides you with a significant saving. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to enhance your experience with our product.
